1.text: And these were the sons of David which were born to him in Hebron: the first-born Amnon to Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second, Daniel to Abigail the Carmelitess:

2.text: The third to Absalom son of Maachah daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth Adonijah son of Haggith:

3.text: The fifth, Shephatiah to Abital the sixth, Ithrean to Eglah his wife.

4.text: Six were born to him in Hebron; and he will reign there seven years and six months: and thirty and three years he reigned in Jerusalem.

5.text: And these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea and Shobab, and Nathan and Solomon; four to Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel:

6.text: And Ibhar and Elishama and Eliphalet,

7.text: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia.

8.text: And Elishama and Eliada, and Eliphalet, nine.

9.text: All the sons of David, besides the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.

10.text: And the son of Solomon, Rehoboam Abiah his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat, his son,

11.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

12.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

13.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

14.text: Amon his son, Josiah his son.

15.text: And the sons of Josiah the firstborn, Johanan the second Jehoiakim; the third Zedekiah; the fourth Shallum.

16.text: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.

17.text: And the sons of Jeconiah: Shealtiel his son,

18.text: Malchimm and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nadabiah.

19.text: The sons of Pedaiah, Zerubbabel and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel: Meshullam and Hannaniah, and Shelomith their sister:

20.text: And Hashubah and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jusab-Hesed, five.

21.text: And the sons of Hananiah: Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnon, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shecaniah.

22.text: And the sons of Shecaniah: Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah: Hattush and Igal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat; six.

23.text: And the sons of Neariah: Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam.

24.text: And the sons of Elioenai, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Delaiah, and Anani; seven.
